mapper.select: SELECT A.MUSIC_NO, A.EMAIL, A.MUSIC_TITLE, A.MUSIC_CONTENT, A.MUSIC_ALBUM, A.MUSIC_GENRE, A.MUSIC_UPLOAD_DATE, A.MUSIC_MODIFY_DATE, A.IP, A.IMG_ORIGIN, A.IMG_FILESYSTEM, A.MUSIC_ORIGIN, A.MUSIC_FILESYSTEM, A.DOWNLOAD_CNT, A.IMAGE_PATH, A.MUSIC_PATH FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MUSIC_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, MUSIC_NO, EMAIL, MUSIC_TITLE, MUSIC_CONTENT, MUSIC_ALBUM, MUSIC_GENRE, MUSIC_UPLOAD_DATE, MUSIC_MODIFY_DATE, IP, IMG_ORIGIN, IMG_FILESYSTEM, MUSIC_ORIGIN, MUSIC_FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, IMAGE_PATH, MUSIC_PATH FROM MUSIC) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
